page.name: Have learners make and share their own TED Talk
page.content:
Practice oral communication skills by having learners make their own TED Talk. TEDEd offers a free curriculum that “supports students in identifying, developing and sharing their ideas in the form of short, TED-style talks.”

Once you've done this a few times, you can use the talks that learners create to develop your own curriculum that focuses on the experiences of adult learners.

Go back to the Try It Yourself Section for a list of all Try it Yourself Options.
